p: Results demonstrated a relatively high correlation was seen between the crude RSV Lysate ELISA and PRNT, and a more moderate correlation was observed between the RSV IgG ELISA and PRNT. Overall, this is an important study in the setting of multiple new vaccine and antibody prophylaxis candidates in clinical trials, for which it would be immensely helpful to have a less expensive, less labor-intensive method of measuring antibody as a correlate of protection.
